Uses of Interface
com.dhemery.core.UnaryOperator

Packages that use UnaryOperator
com.dhemery.configuring Translate configuration options to and from various representations. 
com.dhemery.core Construct objects, evaluate objects, and perform actions. 
com.dhemery.expressing Composable methods to evaluate boolean expressions, make assertions, wait for conditions, and take action when preconditions are met. 
com.dhemery.strings Operate on strings and translate them to other types. 
 

Uses of UnaryOperator in com.dhemery.configuring
 

Methods in com.dhemery.configuring with parameters of type UnaryOperator
 ConfigurationBuilder ConfigurationBuilder.applying(UnaryOperator<String>... operators)
          Append the operators to the list of operators that the configuration will apply whenever an option is queried.
<T> T
Configuration.option(Feature<String,T> translator, String name, UnaryOperator<String>... operators)
          Return the value of the named option, transformed by the operators and translated by the translator.
<T> T
TransformingConfiguration.option(Feature<String,T> translator, String name, UnaryOperator<String>... queryOperators)
          Return the value of the named option, transformed by the configuration and query operators, and translated by the translator
 String Configuration.option(String name, UnaryOperator<String>... operators)
          Return the value of the named option, transformed by the operators.
 String TransformingConfiguration.option(String name, UnaryOperator<String>... queryOperators)
          Return the value of the named option, transformed by the configuration and query operators.
 

Constructor parameters in com.dhemery.configuring with type arguments of type UnaryOperator
TransformingConfiguration(String name, StringDictionary dictionary, List<UnaryOperator<String>> configurationOperators)
          Create a named configuration backed by the given dictionary, and with the given configuration operators.
 

Uses of UnaryOperator in com.dhemery.core
 

Classes in com.dhemery.core that implement UnaryOperator
 class DefaultingTo<T>
          An operator that supplies a default value if its operand is null.
 class NamedUnaryOperator<T>
          An operator described by a fixed name.
 class NullSafeUnaryOperator<T>
          An operator that allows subclasses to operate on the operand without checking for null.
 class Requiring<T>
          An operator that yields its operand if it satisfies some criteria.
